LanguageData.WallRocketTurret.label: wall rocket turret
LanguageData.WallRocketTurret.description: A couple of rockets canisters fitted onto a wall turret base, they can't fire very far due to a vey low fuel capacity in the rockets, and the blast radius is smaller compared to a normal rocket.
LanguageData.Rocket.label: rocket
LanguageData.Gun_WallTurretRocket.label: Wall Rocket Turret
LanguageData.Gun_WallTurretRocket.description: A couple of rockets strapped to a turret base.
